info.title: Service for namespace OData.Demo
info.description:
This service is located at [http://localhost/service-root/](http://localhost/service-root/)

## Entity Data Model
![ER Diagram](https://yuml.me/diagram/class/[Customers{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Customer],[Suppliers{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Supplier],[Products{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Product],[Orders{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Order],[Categories{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Category],[OrderItems{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[OrderItem],[Sales{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Sales],[Employees{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Employee],[LeaveRequests{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[LeaveRequest],[Countries{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Country],[Time{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Time],[SalesOrganizations{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[SalesOrganization],[Currencies{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Currency],[Cities{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[City],[Customer{bg:orange}],[Customer]-*>[Order],[Customer]-*>[Sales],[Customer]++-[Address],[Customer]++-[PhoneNumber],[Supplier{bg:orange}],[Supplier]-*>[Product],[Supplier]++-*[Address],[Product{bg:orange}],[Product]->[Category],[Product]->[Supplier],[Product]-*>[OrderItem],[Product]-*>[Sales],[Order{bg:orange}],[Order]-*>[OrderItem],[Order]->[Customer],[Order]++-[Address],[Customer]^[VipCustomer{bg:orange}],[Category{bg:orange}],[Category]-*>[Product],[OrderItem{bg:orange}],[OrderItem]->[Order],[OrderItem]->[Product],[OrderItem]->[Currency],[Sales{bg:orange}],[Sales]->[Time],[Sales]->[Currency],[Sales]->[Customer],[Sales]->[SalesOrganization],[Sales]->[Product],[Employee{bg:orange}],[Employee]-0..1>[Manager],[Employee]-*>[LeaveRequest],[LeaveRequest{bg:orange}],[LeaveRequest]->[Manager],[LeaveRequest]->[Employee],[Address],[Address]->[Country],[Address]->[City],[Address]^[AddressWithLocation],[Country{bg:orange}],[Supplier]^[PreferredSupplier{bg:orange}],[PreferredSupplier]-0..1>[Employee],[Employee]^[Manager{bg:orange}],[Manager]-*>[Employee],[Manager]-*>[LeaveRequest],[Time{bg:orange}],[Time]-*>[Sales],[SalesOrganization{bg:orange}],[SalesOrganization]-*>[Sales],[SalesOrganization]-0..1>[SalesOrganization],[Currency{bg:orange}],[Currency]-*>[Sales],[City{bg:orange}],[PhoneNumber],[PhoneNumber]^[CellPhoneNumber])

### Legend

post.description: Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

schema.example:
--request-separator
